Description:
Detects when an attacker tries to hide from Sysmon by disabling or stopping it

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Sysmon Configuration Modification
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((state = 'stopped' or log like '%sysmon config state changed%') and  not state = 'started')
